items.name: Component_BlendAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_BlendAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_BlendAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a blend-animation on a game-object.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_BlendAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The easing-object used for the animation.
        * @property easing
        * @type gs.Easing
        ###
        @easing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.easing)
        
    ###*
    * Serializes the blend-animation into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###
    toDataBundle: ->
        easing: @easing
     
    ###*
    * Updates the blend-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        super
        if not @easing.isRunning then return

        @easing.updateValue()
        @object.opacity = @easing.value
        
        if not @easing.isRunning
            @object.opacity = Math.round(@object.opacity)
            @callback?(@object, this)
 
    ###*
    * Starts the blend-animation.
    *
    * @method start
    * @param {number} opacity The target opacity.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if blending is finished. 
    ###  
    start: (opacity, duration, easingType, callback) ->
        @callback = callback
        @easing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        if @object.opacity == opacity then return @callback?(@object, this)
        
        if duration == 0 or @isInstantSkip()
            @object.opacity = opacity
            @callback?(@object, this)
        else
            @easing.startValue(@object.opacity, opacity - @object.opacity, duration)
        
gs.Component_BlendAnimation = Component_BlendAnimation
